overview: The 'grand marriage' is an age-old institution which has been passed from generation to generation on the islands of Grande Comore, Moheli and Anjouan. It's a symbol of social status on the islands and a must for any self-respecting Comoran, a commitment not even the President of the Republic can avoid embracing.
tagline: There are two types of legal unions in the Comoros - the small marriage and the grand one
title: The Grand Marriage
